AER.caption: Image file (see docs)
AER.doc: The image itself. Accepts ".jpg" and ".png" formats only. Reusing the same image will not increase your pdf file size! So reuse without limits (:
AER.name: image_link

AEd.caption: Is this element being put into a Multi Column?
AEd.doc: Mark this box if this element is between the Start and End of a multi column element.
AEd.name: into_multi_column

AEf.caption: Multi Column Name
AEf.doc: The name of the multi column you're wrapping this element within.
AEf.name: multi_column_name

AEj.caption: Image width
AEj.doc: You can leave this empty, then it will use the image's original size. Specify only width and the image will scale proportionaly, specify both width and height and the image will distort to fit.
AEj.name: image_width

AEk.caption: Image height
AEk.doc: You can leave this empty, then it will use the image's original size. Specify only width and the image will scale proportionaly, specify both width and height and the image will distort to fit.
AEk.name: image_height

AFE.caption: Below you will be able to set extra margins for your image element. Leave the box unchecked for a default display. (Will ignore any numbers below)
AFE.name: margin_info

AFc.caption: Is this element being put into the footer?
AFc.doc: Mark this box if this element is to be inserted into the footer.
AFc.name: into_footer

AFd.caption: Is this element being put into the header?
AFd.doc: Mark this box if this element is to be inserted into the header.
AFd.name: into_header

AFq.caption: Is this element being put into the background?
AFq.doc: Mark this box if this element is to be inserted into the background.
AFq.name: into_background

AGM.caption: Repeating structure auxiliary fields. Only use the fields below if this element is being inserted into a repeating structure
AGM.name: repeating_structure_auxiliary_fields

AGN.caption: Image list
AGN.doc: Optional. If you fill this field, the field "Image" up there must be empty. With this field you can pass a list to be displayed, for example the first image of the list will appear in the first structure. Leave this one blank and the image up there will be used and every repeated image will be the same, this is ideal for images that won't change for example images that are part of the structural design instead of user profile image or product images. If you want to pass multiple user or product images, the pass the list of images here.
AGN.name: image_list

AGO.caption: Structure name
AGO.doc: The unique name of the repeating structure this image is being inserted into.
AGO.name: repeating_structure_name
